title: Joe Chandler
text:
Joe Chandler (born 2 November 1988) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who has played in the 2000s and 2010s. He plays for the <a href="Batley%20Bulldogs">Batley Bulldogs</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Championship">Betfred Championship</a>, as a .
Background.
Joe Chandler was born in <a href="Dewsbury">Dewsbury</a>, <a href="West%20Yorkshire">West Yorkshire</a>, England.
Playing career.
He has previously played for <a href="Churwell%20Chiefs%20A.R.L.F.C.">Churwell Chiefs</a> <a href="Churwell%20Chiefs%20ARLFC">ARLFC</a> and the <a href="Leeds%20Rhinos">Leeds Rhinos</a>, making one <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> appearance for the club in 2008 in an 18–12 victory over the <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a>.
